list_definition.definition: an umbrella-shaped piece of light, strong cloth etc beneath which a person etc is tied with ropes so that he etc can come slowly down to the ground from a great height

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They made the descent from the plane by parachute

list_definition.definition: to come down to the ground using a parachute
